column4: question Im using gcc to compile a c program that uses execl() but the compiler it gives me an error in my local machine warnng :myforkexec.c:18: warning: incompatible implicit declaration of built-in function ‘execl’,.. but if i run the same program on a server using unix it works thats anyone have a clue about this???
try running gcc --version on both machines
perhaps your program wont compile with gcc4x so you could try gcc3x
